name: Производство ЛСТК
short_description: LSTC technology allows you to build virtually any buildings on the basis of LSTC profile whether it is an individual dwelling house, hospital, garden, office, hangar, mall or just a shopping pavilion, the only ogranichnie is no more than three full floors. The important point is that the value and quality of construction in this case will be inaccessible to the level of traditional building materials. Commerce - Construction Company "Iris" builds its own building or attracting proven construction organizations to subcontract while maintaining quality assurance at all stages of the construction
summary: LSTC building of houses, sheds, cottages
